Col. Jones
SECRET.
G.T - 79
WAR CABINET.
DRAFT QUESTION AND ANSWER.
To ask the Leader of the House whether he is now able to announce the decision of the Government respecting the Trade Card Scheme, and other forms of exemption from Military Service.
Numerous protests have been received from Trade Unionists and other workers against the operation of the Trade Card Scheme, and other forms of exemption from Military Service.
The Government are now considering the whole question and they hope to be able to announce at an early date comprehensive proposals for dealing with the matter.
